libspot

In our work, we developped an algorithm aimed to detect outliers in streaming data: SPOT. libspot is a C++ library which mainly implements it.

Recently we released python3-libspot which embeds python3 bindings to libspot.

This code is hosted on github and launchpad (so you can just add my ppa to your ubuntu system, use apt-get magic command and you are done!)

Rfolding

I am currently working on a R library which implements a new statistical test of unimodality.
